issues.currentBehavior: Shows SnackBar with 'Detailed analytics coming soon!'
issues.impact: Users cannot access habit analytics functionality

issues.currentBehavior: Shows SnackBar with 'Achievements screen coming soon!'
issues.impact: Users cannot access habit achievements functionality

issues.currentBehavior: Shows SnackBar with 'Habit settings coming soon!'
Shows SnackBar with 'Details for {habit.name} coming soon!'
issues.impact: Users cannot view detailed habit information

issues.description: AI Coach screen included in main navigation but AI sub-features are outside
issues.currentBehavior: AI Coach is in main nav, but AI Insights, Voice Coach outside
issues.expectedBehavior: Consistent navigation structure for all AI features
issues.impact: Inconsistent user experience for AI feature navigation
issues.recommendation: Either move all AI features to main nav or create nested structure

issues.description: Breadcrumb generation relies on design system without page-level configs
issues.currentBehavior: Breadcrumbs generated from navigation tree only
issues.impact: Limited flexibility for custom breadcrumb labels
issues.recommendation: Add export const breadcrumb configs to pages for customization

issues.description: Categories route defined in navigation config but not in App.tsx
issues.currentBehavior: Navigation link exists but route not implemented
Mobile uses bottom nav + side nav, web uses only side nav
issues.expectedBehavior: Consistent navigation patterns adapted for each platform
issues.impact: Users need to learn different navigation patterns
issues.recommendation: Standardize navigation hierarchy while maintaining platform-appropriate UI

issues.description: Different default landing pages after authentication
issues.currentBehavior: Mobile redirects to /home, web apps redirect to /dashboard
issues.recommendation: Align on consistent routing strategy or make differences intentional

issues.description: Navigation icons set to null in central config
issues.currentBehavior: Icons provided at app level rather than centrally
issues.impact: Manual icon management required in each app
issues.recommendation: Define standard icons in navigation config for reuse
